title: Exciting New Features Coming to ClassX
description: We're thrilled to announce several new features that will enhance your learning experience on our platform.

content.data:
We're excited to share that ClassX is getting a major update with several new features designed to make your learning journey even more engaging and effective.

Here's what's coming:

• Interactive Video Lessons with real-time quizzes
• AI-Powered Study Recommendations
• Enhanced Progress Tracking with detailed analytics
• Collaborative Study Groups
• Mobile App for iOS and Android

These features will be rolled out gradually over the next few weeks, starting with the Interactive Video Lessons.

content.caption: Students collaborating in our new study groups feature
